summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of BULL SAGE trading application after linting fixes. Fixed critical frontend compilation error (react-hooks/exhaustive-deps). All major features tested successfully: login flow, dashboard, Academy, Cockpit, Assistant, and navigation components. Backend shows 96.3% success rate (26/27 tests passed). Frontend shows 95%+ success with all core features fully functional.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 404 for some coin detail requests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - coin detail page may not load for some cryptocurrencies

passed_tests: Login flow with provided credentials (coachdigitalparis@gmail.com)
Dashboard loads correctly with portfolio, market data, and news
Academy page navigation and module display
Academy tabs functionality (Modules, Badges, Classement)
Academy module page with lessons list and progress tracking
Cockpit page with daily briefing and alerts system
Assistant IA page with chat interface and ReactMarkdown
AI chat functionality with comprehensive BTC/USD analysis
Mobile responsive design and bottom navigation
NavItem and BottomNavItem components working after extraction
ReactMarkdown rendering in Assistant responses
MarkdownComponents integration in lesson content
Desktop sidebar navigation with all menu items
Mobile bottom navigation with 5 main items (Accueil, Acad√©mie, Trading, Assistant, Plus)
Alert creation modal in Cockpit page
Market data display (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana prices)
News impact section with AI-generated summaries
User profile display and logout functionality
Responsive layout adaptation (desktop 1920x1080, mobile 390x844)
All backend API endpoints (26/27 tests passed)
Authentication system with JWT tokens
Market data APIs (crypto, trending, charts)
AI assistant chat API with context
Paper trading functionality
Watchlist management
Alerts system (create, read, delete)
Strategies management
Admin endpoints access
action_item_for_main_agent: Application is working excellently! Only minor issue: coin detail API occasionally returns 404 for some cryptocurrencies. This doesn't affect core functionality. All refactored components (NavItem, BottomNavItem, MarkdownComponents) are working perfectly after extraction.
